about_the_game:
Welcome to immerGallery, the ultimate VR media viewer!

Immerse in your VR180, VR360 (2D & 3D), panoramas, and regular 2D & 3D photos and videos! Enjoy VR slideshows with your family and friends in Multiplayer.

No more manual image format selection! Our automatic image recognition ensures a seamless journey through your photos, saving you time and effort.

Elevate your images with special effects. Experience the beauty of snowfall and rain, meadows with butterflies, and appreciate falling leaves. Explore environments such as Halloween, St. Patrick's Day, Xmas, and even a hot air balloon, designed for optimal enjoyment of drone-captured images—right from the comfort of your home.

We provide over 300 immersive photos from around the world, including Oktoberfest, castles, and beach locations. Regular updates ensure there is always something new to discover.

Add depth and emotion to your image collection by creating VR slideshows with background audio and voice-overs. Immerse yourself in a photo-realistic experience that allows you to relax and unwind from the real world.

Benefit from the highest image quality, brought to you by industry veterans with extensive expertise in computer graphics and VR.

immerGallery supports browsing through UPnP (beta) and SMB. It enables easy downloads of custom ZIP files from the web.

While our app supports all cameras, we highlight recent models like QooCam EGO, Ricoh Theta, Insta360 One X3, and the Canon RF 5.2mm VR180 lens.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: Intel i3-6100 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200, FX4350 or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960 / AMD 290 equivalent or greater
  • Storage: 1800 MB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR
